WorkItem.Description:
1. Create an instance of a Nerd dinner.
2. Edit that dinner.
3. Attempt to move the push-pin on the embedded Bing map.
RESULT: Map scrolls, and Push Pin remains stuck to the same position relative to the scrolling map.
EXPECTED: Map stays stationary, and Push Pin is moved by the mouse to a new location on the Bing map.
WorkItem.Summary: Edit: pushpin location on Bing map doesn't change
